sentences.en: a book written for professionals and laymen alike
sentences.cn: 一本内行外行都可以读的书

sentences.en: All stories seemed dreadfully alike, no matter who told them.
sentences.cn: 看来, 不管谁讲,故事都是千篇一律的.

sentences.en: Childhood illness can be upsetting for children and parents alike.
sentences.cn: 儿科病会让孩子和父母同样苦恼。

sentences.en: Clergy and laity alike are divided in their views.
sentences.cn: 神职人员和信众同样都观点各异。

sentences.en: I learned a lot from teachers and students alike.
sentences.cn: 我从老师和学生身上都获益良多。

sentences.en: Mr Bowles could engender delight in students and musicians alike.
sentences.cn: 鲍尔斯先生能够让学生和音乐家都感到快乐。

sentences.en: My mother and I are alike in many ways.
sentences.cn: 我和母亲在许多方面很相似。

sentences.en: My sister and I do not look alike.
sentences.cn: 我和我妹妹外貌不相像。

sentences.en: She shows the same kind manner towards great and small alike.
sentences.cn: 她对待大小人物一样和颜悦色.

sentences.en: The language of Darwin was intelligible to experts and non-experts alike.
sentences.cn: 达尔文的语言无论对专家还是非专业人士而言都明白易懂。

sentences.en: The police, raining blows on rioters and spectators alike, cleared the park.
sentences.cn: 警察不分闹事者与观众统统一顿猛击，把人们清除出了足球场。

sentences.en: The resort is tuned in to the tastes of young and old alike.
sentences.cn: 这个度假胜地适合各种口味，老少皆宜。

sentences.en: The twins are so alike that I can't tell which is which.
sentences.cn: 这对双胞胎一模一样,我分辨不出谁是谁.

sentences.en: The two men were far more alike than they would ever admit.
sentences.cn: 那两个人也许不承认，可他们非常相像。

sentences.en: The wine goes with strong and mild cheese alike.
sentences.cn: 喝这酒的时候可以搭配浓乳酪或淡乳酪。

sentences.en: They were dressed alike in blue jersey and knickers.
sentences.cn: 他们穿着一致,都是蓝色的运动衫和灯笼短裤.

sentences.en: We're both alike—there is a streak of madness in us both.

trans.tran_en: used to emphasize that you mean both the people, groups, or things that you have just mentioned
